properties.entry: UPDATE BANKBOOK SET BALANCE = BALANCE + ? WHERE USER_NAME = ?
UPDATE BANKBOOK SET BALANCE = BALANCE - ? WHERE USER_NAME = ?
DELETE FROM BANKBOOK WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
UPDATE BANKBOOK SET BALANCE = BALANCE + ? WHERE BANKBOOK_NO = ?
UPDATE BANKBOOK SET BALANCE = BALANCE - ? WHERE BANKBOOK_NO = ?
